summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in the New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit, scheduling or summarizing a teleconference regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates ongoing FBI investigation into Epstein's activities in early 2019.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York VCAC/Human Trafficking
persons.context: Author of the email regarding a teleconference about Epstein, from the FBI's New York Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit.

events.title: Teleconference regarding Epstein
events.description: An FBI teleconference was scheduled or held regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York VCAC/Human Trafficking

keyFacts: The FBI's New York Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit was actively involved in the Epstein investigation as of January 2019.
The document is an internal FBI email communication regarding a teleconference about Epstein.
The email date (January 8, 2019) places this communication after Epstein's 2008 plea deal but before his July 2019 arrest.
